## IPackageJsonExports.require property

This export matches when loaded via `require()`<></>. This is always mutually exclusive with [IPackageJsonExports.import](./node-core-library.ipackagejsonexports.import.md)<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
require?: string | IPackageJsonExports;
```
